results.description: Lionel Messi scores two goals and provides two assists as Barcelona thrash Real Valladolid to return to the top of La Liga.

results.description: West Brom record signing Oliver Burke is loaned to Spanish side Alaves, while Matt Phillips signs a new three-year contract.

results.description: Barcelona are within touching distance of the La Liga title as goals from Carles Alena and Luis Suarez secure a comfortable victory at Alaves.

results.description: Teenager Vinicius Junior produces a superb display as Real Madrid warm up for their El Clasico clash against Barcelona with a comfortable win over Alaves.
